DataElement.preferredName: Primary Breast Neoplasm Surgical Procedure Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date the primary surgical procedure, a treatment procedure involving an incision and/or removal or replacement of a benign or malignant neoplasm of the breast parenchyma, to the breast was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Breast Neoplasm Surgical Procedure Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the primary surgical procedure,  a treatment procedure involving an incision and/or removal or replacement of a benign or malignant neoplasm of the breast parenchyma being performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original. (American Heritage Dictionary):A benign or malignant neoplasm of the breast parenchyma.  It can originate from the ducts, lobules or the breast adipose tissue.  Breast neoplasms are much more common in females than males. -- 2003:Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
A benign or malignant neoplasm of the breast parenchyma. It can originate from the ducts, lobules or the breast adipose tissue. Breast neoplasms are much more common in females than males.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
